import networkx as nx
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def girvan_newman(G):
    communities = []
    while True:
        edge_betweenness = nx.edge_betweenness_centrality(G)
        max_edge = max(edge_betweenness.items(), key=lambda x: x[1])
        G.remove_edge(*max_edge[0])
        components = [c for c in nx.connected_components(G)]
        if len(components) > len(communities):
            communities.append(components)
        if len(components) == len(G.nodes):
            break
    return communities

G = nx.karate_club_graph()
communities = girvan_newman(G)
for c in communities:
    print(c)
nx.draw(G, with_labels=True)
plt.show()
prompt: Community detection için Girvan-Newman algoritmasını yaz.
